description:
Inside a water duct, Tsuna is hit by an attack from a Strau Moska, controlled by Spanner, and sinks into the water. He desperately fights in the water, but he cannot breathe. He manages to get out of the water and freeze the Strau Moska using his Deathperation Point Zero Breakthrough: First Edition. But the Strau Moska shoot fire from their abdomen, break out of the ice, and attack Tsuna! Upon seeing this, Tsuna says that he`s been waiting for this, and uses his Deathperation Point Zero Revised. Meanwhile, Spanner is beginning to take an interest in Tsuna`s techniques rather than being concerned with winning the battle…
Source: crunchyroll
